00168

00172         BOOLEAN  m_rp;                   // TP-RP: TP-Reply-Path (3GPP 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.3.17])

00174         BOOLEAN m_single_srr;
00175 
00176         // SMS command type only
00177         CommandType m_ct;                // TP-CT: TP-Command-Type (3GPP 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.3.19])
00178         SmsReferenceNumber m_mn;         // TP-MN: TP-Message-Number (3GPP 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.3.18])
00179

00183         SmsPortNo m_originator_port_no;  // part of TP-UDH - define application port ID
